content: Themed boxes for guys that give a damn, delivered monthly. They’re packed with seriously high-quality, seriously unique goods that add up to way more than $45 – in fact, they’re always worth at least $70, and usually quite a bit more.

Go off the grid without forgoing the comforts of home by moving into the Greenmoxie tiny house. This eco-friendly 340-square-foot home makes use of every inch of its compact layout to provide every amenity you’d desire, from electricity to a fully functional bathroom.

Brighten up your personal space with some gamer flair using this neat Crash Bandicoot TNT light. Styled exactly like the TNT boxes from the classic game, it emits a striking orange glow and even plays the exploding crate sound effect when turned on.

No matter how rough and rugged the terrain, the Ariel Nomad tactical buggy will get you to where you want to go. This off-road capable ride is lightweight and boats a 233 horsepower Honda VTEC engine that will let you reach 60 miles per hour in just 3.5 seconds.

This throwable flower vase fire extinguisher will help keep you safe while blending into your home’s decor. This Molotov-cocktail-styled extinguisher is designed so that it can easily be thrown from a safe distance to quell the flames and stop the fire from spreading.

Make a fashion statement with your timepiece by accenting your outfit with one of these fabulous Bulova Computron LED watches. They feature a unique and futuristic looking trapezoidal case that is available in either a gold, black, or a stainless steel finish.

He said NO to drugs, brought Gorbachev and the sinister U.S.S.R. down to their knees, and invented Reaganomics. Now you can show your patriotism by commemorating the greatness of the 40th president with the Ronald Reagan riding a velociraptor painting.

Airbnb is giving one extremely lucky person the chance to spend an unforgettable night at the Louvre. The winner will get the VIP treatment as they sleep beneath the iconic pyramid as well as get to enjoy a series of exclusive tours of the iconic landmark.

Imagine how much fun it would be to soar the open skies aboard the Trek Aerospace FK2 Flying Go-Kart! This insane concept ride features a design with a centralized pilots seat surrounded by a slew of ducted fans meant to propel the craft into the air.

To celebrate the start of the Reiwa era and the Enthronement of Emperor Naruhito, The Oak Door restaurant has introduced this delicious monstrosity. This one-of-a-kind burger comes stuffed with everything from Wagyu beef slices to foie gras, and black truffles.

Transform your next soak into a relaxing Technicolor dreamscape with this rainbow bath bomb. Upon being dropped into your tub, the white cloud-shaped bomb begins to leave brilliant rainbow streaks as it dissolves into the water.

Digital designer Mo Aoun has reimagined what Rivian’s all-electric R1S SUV would look like as a rugged National Forests patrol vehicle. This green and mean SUV will boast 750 horsepower along with a 400+ mile range.

Get a chance to follow in the footsteps of the great Clark Griswold by placing your bid on this replica station wagon from the classic Nation Lampoon’s Vacation flick. This movie-accurate replica is the perfect ride for any road warrior looking for the adventure of a lifetime!

Turn heads when walking down the street in these D&G melted slime soles sneakers. These extraordinarily designed slip-on kicks feature an incredibly bright artisan-poured liquid thermoplastic material that makes them look like they’re covered in a fashionable slime.

Send a loud and clear message to anyone thinking about sneaking a sip of your hooch by storing it in this middle finger whiskey decanter. This conversation piece comes in a set that includes the decanter, 2 tumbler glasses, 6 whiskey stones, and a wooden base.

SuperEight is the savory craft beer from Dogfish Head and Kodak that can actually be used to develop film! This unique brew features a pH level that is low enough to develop Kodak’s Super 8 film – making this the ideal brew for photographers and beer connoisseurs alike.

With hopes of revolutionizing air travel, NASA and MIT have joined forces to produce this Morphing Wing concept. Unlike traditional aircrafts, it is designed to change shape mid-flight in order to allow for greater control of the aircraft’s trajectory.

This flaming basketball hoop will give an entirely new meaning to being on fire when you’re shooting some hoops. It comes with an easy mounting bracket ideal for placing on any door and features a special rim that bursts into flames after you sink in 3 shots.

They say you should never bring a knife to a gun fight, unless you’re armed with this built-in revolver bayonet knife. This intriguing bayonet conceals a .22 LR six shot revolver within the handle and is designed to fit perfectly on an M16/AR15 with a standard military configuration.

Experience total mayhem by having a real-life battle royale with your friends using these Takara Tomy X-Tag light guns. It combines online multiplayer FPS and laser tag and even comes equipped with a smartphone mount so that you can easily connect and play wirelessly.

The world’s largest T-Rex fossil has been unearthed and is changing what was previously thought about this legendary predator. Thought to have weighed around 19,500lbs, this 65% complete fossil includes the skull and hips along with parts of the ribs and legs bones.

After a long hiatus, Lucky Charms marshmallow-only cereal is back! This incredible and magically delicious cereal throws some little whimsical unicorn marshmallows into the mix and will be handed out as a prize to 15,000 lucky contest winners.

Calling all gearheads, this gorgeous 1968 Shelby Mustang GT 500 can be yours for the right price! Up for auction, this classic ride boasts some serious horsepower along with an incredible 440 ft-lbs of torque and staggered rear shocks for improved stability.

The vacation home of the future has arrived in the form of the Skydome cabin. This Russian creation reinvents the standard cabin layout in favor of a spacious spherical shape available in six variations ranging in size from 365 to 3,229 square feet.

This Alien Xenomorph Pikachu is one of the most adorably terrifying creatures you’ll ever see. Sold directly through the artist’s site, this sinister looking rodent-sized resin mashup stands about 4-inches tall and makes the perfect little gift for both Pokemon and Aliens fans alike.

Escape the monotony of everyday life by hitting the open road behind the wheel of an Honest Camper adventure van. These rentable rolling homes come fully tricked-out with all the essentials necessary for a thrilling life on the road.

You’d be crazy NOT to drink out of a mug that doesn’t have your beautiful face plastered all over it! These heat reactive mugs can be customized with any face you want, and make the perfect gift idea for someone who truly loves themselves!

Gain a deeper understanding of the vastness of the cosmos by gazing at this Megastar Class home planetarium. Despite its small size, it projects in all directions so you can see around 1 million nearby stars – and also offers dusk, dawn and blue sky mood lighting.

Make a statement at your upcoming nuptials by ditching the sweets and indulging in this mammoth 24-pound cheese wedding cake. This towering treat features layer after layer of premium artisan cheese that’ll feed up to 150 hopefully-not-lactose-intolerant guests.

Apart from designing some jaw-dropping rides for Aston Martin, Carrozzeria Zagato also worked with Fiat to produce rides like this 1955 Fiat 8V Coupé Zagato. This vintage racing vehicle competed in events throughout the ’70s and has since been restored to its former glory.

These uniquely designed 3D printed speakers turn sand into incredible sound that’ll fill your room while adding to its decor. It’s equipped with a 3-inch fulll-range driver that provides a frequency response of 75 to 20,000Hz with minimal distortion.

Journal 29 is a unique book game with puzzles: solve the puzzles submit your answers online get the keys and move forward. To solve the puzzles, you need to think out of the box, write, draw, fold and more. Journal 29 is an escape room in a book.

Is your car vulnerable to keyless car theft? KeyBlock is similar to current Faraday pouches that block all RFID signals, preventing thieves from gaining access to your car without a key. Additionally, KeyBlock’s design has some awesome new features!

This breathtaking full-scale LEGO McLaren Senna is a testament to what can be done with a little focus and dedication. Composed of 480,000 pieces, this incredible 1:1 scale vehicle was put together by 30 talented assemblers during a period of nearly 5,000 hours.

Virtual Reality takes another leap forward with the Oculus Rift S VR headset. It boasts a per-eye resolution of 1280 x 1440 and comes with 5 onboard tracking cameras along with updated LCD screens and near-ear speakers for an incredibly immersive experience.

With its incredibly diminutive size, the Le Chiquito bag takes high-end fashion to new heights! Created by French design house Jacquemus, this reasonably priced accent piece offers loads of storage capacity and can either be dressed up or down to match your style.

Whether you’re up against a horde of zombies or just want to work on your aim, the Cobra tactical repeating crossbow will get the job done. It features an AR-15-inspired adjustable stock, has a 130-pound draw weight, and can fire an arrow at 270 fps.

The Traveler XL tiny house delivers all the modern comforts you’ve come to expect from a traditional home for a fraction of the price. Despite its small size, this intelligently designed home comes with a full bathroom, kitchen, and a surprisingly spacious bedroom.

The FedEx SameDay delivery robot is the hard working bot willing to go the distance – literally – to ensure a speedy delivery and total satisfaction. It travels through sidewalks and comes equipped with a series of cameras that help it avoid obstacles as it makes its way to you.

Only a handful of humans have ventured to the deepest parts of the ocean. The Triton Hadal Underwater Exploration System aims to change that and is currently on a worldwide expedition with hopes of reaching the deepest point in each of the wold’s five oceans.

Tap is an all-in-one Bluetooth super controller designed to streamline the way you interact with your devices. From computers to smartphones to VR headsets and more, Tap puts you in control using simple finger inputs on any surface.

Located on the Norwegian coastline, the Snøhetta underwater restaurant offers a dining experience like no other. The large dining area features an 11 x 4 meter panoramic acrylic window that treats guests to breath-taking underwater vistas while they dine.

Shareholders rejoice! Apple’s endgame of taking everyone’s money has finally come to fruition with the introduction of the Apple credit card. This interest accruing status symbol features contactless payments, and provides extremely detailed spending reports.

titleEN: Game Of Thrones Chocolate Dragon Eggs
content: Celebrate the premiere of the long awaited final season in true Targaryen fashion with these delectable chocolate dragon eggs. These eye-catching and mouth-watering treats are made from creamy white chocolate and are hand painted to look just like dragon eggs.

No matter that excursion you have in mind, the Yamaha Wabash adventure gravel E-bike will handle it with ease. It boasts a 500-watt battery, an electric drive system with 4 levels of pedal assist, and an on-board display that provides pertinent riding info like speed and distance.

titleEN: A Plot Of Land On The Sun
content: In these trying economic times, it’s more important than ever to make wise investment decisions – that’s why you need to purchase your plot of land on the Sun before there’s no more space left on our solar system’s hottest property!

PorTable is your new adventure companion that functions as a lightweight, foldable, transportable table that powers your devices anywhere to stay connected. Share music with built-in speakers, and stay prepared with a replaceable power bank & much more!

The Desert Storm Trophy Truck is the ruggedly awesome 4 x 4 that will make you look like the most badass driver this side of the Mississippi. It boasts a top-class suspension system, a roll cage, and most notably an imposing and head-turning aerodynamic body.

Believe it or not, some Chinese multi-millionaire out there has actually paid over one million dollars for a pigeon. This prized Belgian racing pigeon is named Armando and is considered to be the best long distance racing pigeon of all time.

Look like the coolest kid on the block in these Toy Story Pizza Planet sneakers. These comfy kicks feature a Polyurethane upper with a rubber sole and display a stylish design based on the Pizza Planet restaurant chain from the beloved Pixar movie.

Why stand when you can sit?! Designed in a joint effort from Sir Mix-A-Lot and The Snuggie company, the bean bag onesie gives you some seriously flattering junk in the trunk so that at a moment’s notice you can have a round mound of plush seating!

Learn about the world around you with this scientifically accurate flat Earth snow globe. This incredibly life-like replica depicts how our planet actually looks like – unlike that bloated marble-like object “scientists” and other pseudo-intellectuals claim the Earth is actually like.

Kirby’s hunger is never-ending. He’s inhaled enemies, friends, blocks, bricks, and food. But he’s never truly satisfied. He wants more! He wants… to clean your house. It’s voice activated and compatible with a variety of smart home hubs.

Fisker is looking to reinvent the SUV and usher it into the future with their all-new all-electric SUV. Apart from its sleek futuristic design, this competitively priced ride will have a range of 300 miles and is expected to hit the streets in 2021.

Class up your game room by upgrading your wooden board to this elegant marble chess set. This exquisite set is handcrafted entirely from white Italian Carrara and black Spanish Nero Marquina marble and includes both a gameboard and 32 classically styled pieces.

The Dirigo 2 is the ultralight backpacking tent that shelters you from the elements without weighing you down. This three-season tent is made from the ultra durable and lightweight Dyneema fabric and is large enough to sleep two.

Make your yard look just like a level from Super Mario with these Goomba garden statues. This geeky piece of garden decor is crafted from durable resin and stands at only eight inches, making it ultra portable and perfect for placing nearly anywhere.

The Senna GTR Hypercar is McLaren’s most extreme track car to date. This lightweight track-only car boasts an impressive 4.0-liter twin-turbocharged V8 with 813 horses of power and has a power-to-weight ratio of 694 bhp-per ton.

Celebrate the life of the late Stephen Hawking by adding this special edition coin to your collection. It’s double the weight of the silver Proof 50p coin and it is the first in a new series of coins designed to celebrate innovators in the field of science.

The BolaWrap 100 is the remote restraint device that shoots out an 8-foot bola style tether at 640 feet per second and wraps around the assailant’s legs and ankles around 1 to 3 times in order to stop them dead on their tracks.

Set your content apart from the rest by creating incredible and professional quality videos with the EVO foldable 3D 360° camera. The camera can either capture 360° 2D video when it is folded up or 180° 3D video when it is opened flat.

Oceanco’s latest project, the Esquel Expedition yacht is the 345-foot long diesel-electric vessel that is designed for those who want to explore some of our planet’s most remote and secluded locations without leaving the lap of luxury.

titleEN: Apple AirPods Glow In The Dark Case
content: With this glow in the dark Apple AirPods case at your disposal you’ll never again have trouble finding your headphones in a poorly lit room. This high quality case provides 360-degree protection while also emitting a bright green glow.

Pint is the new, compact, and affordable self-balancing electric skateboard that will make you look forward to your daily commute. It’s around 15% smaller than the Plus model, has a range of 8 miles, and a top speed of 16 miles per hour.

To mark the 90th anniversary of Mickey and Minnie Mouse’s debut LEGO has released this must-have Steamboat Willie set. The set includes everything you’ll need to construct your very own S.S. Willie – including Mickey Mouse and Minnie Mouse minifigs.

Keep your home safe without sacrificing style by swapping your tacky red eyesore of an extinguisher for this wine bottle fire extinguisher. The clever design tastefully disguises the handy extinguisher like a giant bottle of wine.

La Moto Volante 496 is the flying motorcycle that will conquer both land and air! This insane-looking ride boasts a massive 470 horsepower V8 alongside a set of four jet turbine wheels which open outward so that the bike can take flight.

Melt your cares away with an ultra relaxing hydro-massage session courtesy of the Aquatica Nexus Spa. This top-of-the-line spa is fitted with 20 hydro-massage jets, 8 air nozzles, and features a minimalist and modern design that makes it ideal for both indoor or outdoor use.

Treat everyone driving behind you to an action-packed wrestling match by outfitting your ride with these brawling wrestlers windshield wipers. The hilarious and clever design of these wipers makes them the perfect car accessory for anyone who loves lucha libre!

The world’s first 1TB microSD cards have arrived! Both Micron and SanDisk are releasing MicroSD cards with an unheard of storage capacity of 1TB. Each of these MicroSDs will also be A2 certified which means you’ll be able to insert them into your smartphone.

Gain a new appreciation for nature by getting a bird’s-eye view of some breathtaking vistas by paying a visit to the Camp Adventure park. The trail begins at a 900 meter long path that starts at the forest floor and ends at a spectacular 45 meter tall observation tower.

titleEN: Mercedes Benz Formula E Race Car
content: Mercedes Benz is sure to make a splash in the all-electric racing circuit when it unveils the EQ Silver Arrow 01. This Formula E Race Car will boast a 52kWh battery pack and will be able to go from 0 – 60 in just 2.7 seconds and reach a top speed of 174 mph.

If you’re looking to disconnect and become one with nature, the Crystal Peak Lookout has got you covered. This secluded getaway is nestled high among the tree tops and comes with amenities like an indoor fireplace and a cozy wood fired sauna.

The days of the consoles wars may finally be coming to an end with the introduction of Google’s Stadia cloud-based gaming platform! It provides near-instant streaming of games at 60 FPS in 4K HDR across all your devices, with zero high-end hardware needed!

Soon you may be able to interact, play, and work alongside your favorite Dunder Mifflin employees thanks to LEGO Ideas member theoffice_lego. This amazingly detailed LEGO MOC is composed of over 2,100 pieces and measures 17″ x 19″.

This Alexa enabled robotic lawn mower from Husqvarna is the ultimate in smart lawn care. This little mower will diligently work for up to 100 minutes on a single charge and comes loaded with handy features like voice-activated control with Amazon Alexa and Google Home.

Make your awesome wizard ensemble come to life with one of these magic wizard staffs. You can either choose the eye-catching Chaos Staff that produces 3,000 Btu’s of fireball casting fury or the Fog Staff that releases an eerie mist from the crystal ball located at the top.

With their eye on the future of personal transportation, Goodyear has introduced this revolutionary flying car concept tire. The Goodyear AERO is a 2-in-1 tire meant to work both for driving on the road and as a propeller for flying the friendly skies.

The Hololens 2 mixed reality headset from Microsoft will transform the world around you into a virtual playground. It will feature a new display system for more vibrant holograms that are refined through a time-of-flight depth sensor to enable direct manipulation of them.

Give your bathroom a wow factor by straying away from the norm and opting for this marvelous concrete bathtub. This imposing bathtub is designed and handmade utilizing natural cement with a special top class finish that protects and keeps the surface silky smooth.

With the hopes of continuing the exploration of our moon, Toyota and JAXA (the Japanese version of NASA) have joined forces to bring forth this lunar rover concept. This manned and pressurized rover would feature a cruising range of more than 6,200 miles.

Escape the hustle and bustle of the land by moving into the Naturecruiser floating houseboat. Apart from a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, and outdoor deck, the home boasts solar panels and a water purification system that make it practically self-sufficient.

Jetpack Aviation is ushering civilization into the future of personal transportation with their flying motorcycle. With a design reminiscent of a Star Wars speeder bike, this revolutionary new ride can whiz through the air at 150 mph and reach a maximum altitude of 15,000 feet.

Take your pet obsession from cute to creepy by becoming your feline friend with one of these realistic furry cat masks. Shindo Rinka is the Japanese creative company that is making these custom and hyper realistic cat masks complete with faux fur and whiskers.

Instantly create a magical nighttime atmosphere using this real fire tornado lamp. This unique lighting fixture combines nature and modern technology to produce a stunning visual display as the small but majestic fire twister dances gracefully inside the metallic cylinder.

The newest fleet of expedition cruises from Norwegian cruise provider Hurtigruten are the world’s first battery powered hybrid vessels, making them perfect for environmentally conscious adventure seekers who want to explore our planet’s most remote locations.

Bring style and tranquility to any room in your humble abode with this gorgeous glass bonsai tree. This stunningly beautiful work of art is part of a collection of equally gorgeous pieces, painstakingly created by the superbly talented Italian artist Simone Crestani.

Bring your dull living room decor to life by hanging up this living moss wall art. This vibrant piece of living art features a sea of preserved moss encased by a sleek wood and metal frame that creates a brilliant contrast against the lively green moss inside.

Master the art of loving your bedroom by going through the pages of the IKEA Kama Sutra. Portrayed as the “ultimate guide to bedroom satisfaction” this digital catalog comes packed with an abundance of brilliant bedroom layouts complete with gorgeous illustrations.

Make sleeping with the fishes something to get excited about by booking your stay at this shark aquarium underwater bedroom through Airbnb. You’ll get to spend the night completely submerged in a 3 million liter aquarium, surrounded by 35 majestic sharks.

Tesla is looking to enter the mid-sized crossover SUV market with their new Tesla Model Y. With a range of 300 miles, it will be able to do 0-60 in just 3.5 seconds and will also offer features like 66 cubic feet of cargo space, autopilot mode, and a panoramic glass roof.

What better way to hydrate during those grueling gaming sessions than with this ingeniously designed Donkey Kong barrel mug? Although it’s not dishwasher or microwave safe, this mug is perfect for any cold or room temperature beverage.

The Lamborghini Hurracan Evo Spyder is the exotic car that turns driving into a thrill ride. This stunning 631 horsepower vehicle tops out at 201 miles per hour and features a sleek aerodynamic body topped off with a convertible top that retracts in just 17 seconds.

If you’re fascinated by ancient life you’ll love adding this real Spinosaurus tooth to your collection of fossils. Each specimen consists of the complete crown and partial root of a Spinosaurus tooth and comes encased in an elegant glass-topped Riker box.

Enjoy the comforts of home when you’re out on the road by hitting the trail behind the wheel of a Global X expedition vehicle. Each rugged ride can be customized with the chassis, body model, and floor layout of your choice to suit your particular needs.

LG’s smartphone dual screen attachment will forever change the way you use your smartphone. This handy attachment essentially doubles your screen size and offers a complete 360 degree rotation – making it ideal for everything from gaming to surfing the web.

Cut out the middle man by growing some premium medicine from the comfort of home using this cannabis grow system. This compact gadget fits easily in any room and allows you to constantly monitor your plants for premium results.

This modified Nissan Energy Roam Woodworking Van is a carpenter’s dream come true. Nissan and Studio Hardie teamed up to create this magnificent mobile workshop that comes equipped with everything from its own power grid to a rail-mounted swivel shop stool.

This wooden camp mug is the traditional Nordic mug that should be part of every outdoorsman’s pack. This gorgeous mug is hand carved from a solid chunk of natural wood and sports an ergonomic handle with dual finger holes for a more secure hold.

Train for the upcoming zombie apocalypse like never before with the 5K zombie survival marathon that will be coming to a city near you! This one-of-a-kind marathon includes obstacle courses as well as endless zombies scattered throughout the marathon.
